plugin.name: Import Export
plugin.description: Import/Export data in just few clicks
plugin.page.homepage.section.need-help.d: A feature to request? A bug to report? Feel free to reach out on discord or github ✌️
plugin.message.export.error.forbidden.me: You don't have permission to read this data type.
plugin.message.export.error.unexpected.m: An unexpected error occured while exporting your data.
plugin.message.import.error.forbidden.me: You don't have permission to write this data type.
plugin.message.import.error.payload-too-: The data size exceeds the file size limit of the server. Checkout the documentation to increase the file size limit.
plugin.message.import.error.unexpected.m: An unexpected error occured while importing your data.
plugin.message.import.success.imported-s: Your data has been imported successfully.
plugin.message.import.success.imported.m: Your data has been imported successfully. Refresh your page to see the latest updates.
plugin.message.import.error.imported-par: Some data failed to be imported. See below for detailed information.
plugin.import.drag-drop-file: Drag & drop your file into this area or browse for a file to upload
plugin.export.apply-filters-and-sort: Apply filters and sort to exported data.
